Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 125th overall pick, by Boston in 2010...
Injured on 7/28/2015 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2016, off John Lamb (TB)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/13/2016, off Wes Littleton (CHA)...
Injured on 9/17/2017 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from Boston to Tampa Bay on 6/9/2018 (Going to BOS: RF J. Puñal, 1B D. Alexander Jr., 2B N. Gast. Going to TB: C C. Thomas)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Minnesota on 8/9/2019...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Minnesota on 8/11/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/12/2019, hitting .607 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2019, hitting .452 with 3 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/10/2021, hitting .565 with 0 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Kansas City on 7/25/2021...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/1/2022 to a 5-year deal worth $19,999,999 per year...
Injured on 4/5/2022 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/13/2024, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
